channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.description:
Id: 4bad4d9e-2a13-4888-94bb-c8432f6f3040
Display name: Storage Actions Blob Data Operator
Description: Used by the Storage Actions - Storage Task to list & perform operations on the Storage Account blobs
Link: https://management.azure.com/4bad4d9e-2a13-4888-94bb-c8432f6f3040?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 77789c21-1643-48a2-8f27-47f858540b51
Display name: Storage Actions Task Assignment Contributor
Description: Used by the Storage Actions assigner to create a Task Assignment on their target Storage Account, with RBAC privileges for Managed Identity
Link: https://management.azure.com/77789c21-1643-48a2-8f27-47f858540b51?api-version=2022-04-01
